Reviews.Title: Good for its price
Reviews.Author: Mr Blister "Mr. S"
Reviews.Content: The GW300 is a QWERTY phone, that kind of looks like the BB8900. It was made for SMS and Email, and to access sites such as facebook with the apps coming pre installed.The good:OK camera for this price range.MP3 Player with FM Radio, with a standard 3.5 MM jack.QWERTY KeyboardLarge DisplayThe Bad:Not much internal memoryDoes not work on the 3G networkIn short:Its a good phone for its price. But don't expect all the features and speed of a $400 Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: BAD CHOICE
Reviews.Author: Flavio Rosa
Reviews.Content: This item was never received... The WorldWide Distributors didn't care about the situation and I had to keep both loss, the money that I paid for and the product that I never got.... BAD CHOICE!!!!! Never again!!!!

Reviews.Title: waste of time
Reviews.Author: jlaw
Reviews.Content: Some of the phone was in spanish and misspelled. It was really wierd. I returned it and they covered the shipping charges to return it.
